mapper.insert: insert into category(id, type, name, sort, status, create_time, update_time, create_user, update_user) values (#{id}, #{type}, #{name}, #{sort}, #{status}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{createUser}, #{updateUser})
mapper.select:
select * from category
and name like "%"#{name}"%"
and type = #{type}
order by sort asc, create_time desc
